tr.td: Identifies an override where a service is being performed against an order that the system does not recognize as equivalent to the ordered service.
Identifies an override where a service is being performed for longer than the ordered period of time.
Identifies an override where a repetition of service is being performed sooner than the ordered frequency.

description.value: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0518 ( Override Type)

valueString.value: Identifies an override where a service is being performed against an order that the system does not recognize as equivalent to the ordered service.
Identifies an override where a service is being performed for longer than the ordered period of time.
Identifies an override where a repetition of service is being performed sooner than the ordered frequency.
